name: Soldiers of Fortune
overview: It's eight miles of bubbling mud pits to the compound. Once inside, you're up against the lethal Chaos Engine. It has the power to create any kind of trap, any type of monster. If you can make it back, you'll never need to work again. Going solo would be risky. Who to take? The Thug and his sawed-off? That Mercenary with the Gatling gun? Be sure to take the right cover man 'cause this could either be your last day at work or your last day of life.
